page.title: 14BUILDINGS CLAPHAM CONTINUED
page.content: There was not a lid on legs or cage over the top of the chimney. The other new buildings are Michael's house,and the garage. There is another new house in Clapham being built .It is about \ the way up Cross Haw Lane at the back of the village.It is going to belong to the Pastor of the Bethel Chapel.Mr. Pitcher's house is a breeze block house with a shaped sandstone finish.Of course there was bitumen for waterproofing.There were 5 windows on the front and 4 windows and a door on the side.There weren't any window frames.On the roof,well there wasn't a roof,just the stone mountings on the front and back,there weren't even any rafters.Downstairs there are going to be 3 rooms a hall,and a staircase. Upstairs there are going to be three bedrooms,and a bathroom.
